remarks: Version of ~ rexxp with bound-variable hypotheses.  (Contributed by NM, 19-Dec-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2016.)
statement:
ralxpf.1 $e |- F/ y ph $.
ralxpf.2 $e |- F/ z ph $.
ralxpf.3 $e |- F/ x ps $.
ralxpf.4 $e |- ( x = <. y , z >. -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
rexxpf $p |- ( E. x e. ( A X. B ) ph <-> E. y e. A E. z e. B ps ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y z $.
